text.div:
Overall Claim Disposition Code

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
0 No edits present on claimadded v2.4
1 Only edits present are for line item denial or rejectionadded v2.4
2 Multiple-day claim with one or more days denied or rejectedadded v2.4
3 Claim denied, rejected, suspended or returned to provider with only post payment editsadded v2.4
4 Claim denied, rejected, suspended or returned to provider with only pre payment editsadded v2.4

name: v2 Overall Claim Disposition Code
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0457 ( Overall Claim Disposition Code)
